title: Boys in Love
overview: Hop on the rollercoaster of love among 12th graders! Shane, a smart and driven student who excels in academics and school activities, has no interest in teenage life. That is, until he meets Kit, a carefree student who's his complete opposite. Forced to spend time together, sparks fly in unexpected ways. Meanwhile, Kim, another of Shane's classmates, is a hopeless romantic determined to find love before graduation. When he meets Mon, a new transfer student, Kim decides to do whatever it takes to win his heart. This new semester, open your heart to chaotic love experiences!
